welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ar Rayyan, Qatar! Enjoy the city's rich cultural heritage, beautiful parks, and vibrant food scene. We invite you to explore and experience everything this charming city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A new terminal for Qatar Airways and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Al Udeid AB Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Al Udeid AB Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
